mcq.statement: In which year did Chaudhry Rahmat Ali publish his historic pamphlet 'Now or Never', coining the word Pakistan for the first time?
mcq.one_liner: Chaudhry Rahmat Ali coined the word Pakistan for the first time in his 1933 pamphlet **'Now or Never'**.
